title: Computer/Technology Icons
content:
I was wonndering if anyone had any advice on research material for designing icons?

 [‹ New to Adobe Illustrator](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005534/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41091 "Go to previous forum topic") [Check mark symbol? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005534/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41082 "Go to next forum topic")
author: umlautthoni

comments.content: You can check out [Jasper Hauser’s blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005534/http:/www.jasperhauser.nl/weblog/), and since I’m a full-time icon designer, I also have some stuff in the [Icon Design category of my blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005534/http:/blog.cocoia.com/category/icon-design/). I hope this is of any use.
